title: Highly Portable Filtration Straws - LifeStraw Sip Filters Bacteria, Microplastics and More (TrendHunter.com)
text:
The LifeStraw Sip water filtration straw is the brand's latest water purification device engineered to provide peace of mind for those looking to clean their water no matter where they are.
The ultra-compact straw is suited for being used just like a conventional reusable straw and has a stainless steel construction for impressive durability. The straw is rated to filter out 99.999% of microplastics, 99.9999999% of bacteria and 99.999% of parasites to provide impressive peace of mind for those looking to enjoy water from a variety of sources or simply from home.
The LifeStraw Sip water filtration straw has an internal membrane microfilter that's rated to filter up to 1,000-liters of water before it needs to be replaced.
